author: Lizette Serrano
text: Both the wedding film and ceremony film came out amazing. We are absolutely happy!! This was more than what we imagined, and we are beyond grateful. thank you!!!!!

author: Anthony Fanelli
text: Just wanted to say, we watched and we loved it! You did an amazing job!

author: Jackie Caldera
text: Our film was fantastic! Thank you so much for all your professionalism and attention to detail. You've been awesome to work with.
